subject: Re: Help w/"JUnit Best Practices" Program from JavaWorld
msgSnippet: ... unfortunate ... Basically, ... classpath ... thing I ... Is there a way to modify the bp code so you don t have to change your classpath? - Greg
messageBody:

classpath?
